actions.name: Firing Wild
actions.desc:
Choose one: Deal 1 damage to each adjacent enemy; -or- deal 1 damage to up to 3 enemies within range; -or- deal 1 damage to up to 2 enemies you can see beyond your maximum range.
5+: Choose two instead.
8+: Deal 2 damage instead.

actions.name: Kneecapper
actions.desc:
This is a Gunslinger Action.
Choose one or two enemies within range. Deal 1 damage and give 2 Fatigue tokens to each target.
